195545.「……水温よし。\n しびれくらげの姿も……見えないな。:
Water temperature good. I don't see any Man o'
War.

195547.「まどろっこしいのは ナシだぜ。\n スリルとロマンスの夏は 唐突に始まる……。:
No need to be slow. The summer of thrills and
romance begins abruptly.

195549.「この夏 最大の青春が\n 大グチ開けて 待ってるってなぁ！:
This summer, the greatest youth is waiting for
us with a big mouth!

195550.「よぉーっし！ お前たち！\n お待ちかね 海開きの時間だぞぉっ！:
Yo, guys! Hey you guys! Wait for me, it's time
to open the sea!

195551.<if_woman>「ちょいと そこの……\n 夏の日差しが よく似合う お嬢さ:
<if_woman>A little bit of summer sunshine looks good on
this young lady.<else>A little bit of summer sunshine looks good on
this young man.<endif>

195552.「どうしても 頼みてぇことがあるんだ！\n オレは ビーチ中央の 孤島の岩場にい:
I have a favor to ask you! I'm at Rocky Island
in the beachcenter, so why don't you swim down
to the beach?

195553.「水着は……そうだな。オレの手伝い スイミアに\n ビーチのみんなの心を ひとつ:
Swimsuits, yes. My helper Suimia will give me
the watchword that will unite the hearts of
everyone on the beach.

195554.「合言葉は 『まなつのうみにかんぱい』だ！\n 忘れるんじゃねぇぜ！\n それじ:
The watchword is "Manatsu no Umi ni Kanpai" ("Cherry Blossoms in the Sea of Manatsu")! Don't forget it! I'll be waiting for you at
Rocky Island.

195555.スイミアの近くで チャットの設定を\n『まわりに』にして ムーロンに教えてもらっ:
When you are near Suimia, set the chat setting
to "Nearby" and say the words that Muron
taught you.

195556.いかにも 金銀財宝が隠されていそうな宝箱だ。\n開けてみますか？<yesno><:
It looks like a treasure chest where gold and
silver treasures might be hidden. Would you
like to open it?<yesno><close>

195557.こんなに 気になる宝箱を\nほうっておくわけには いかない！\n開けてみますか？:
We can't leave such an interesting treasure
chest unattended! Would you like to open it?<yesno><close>

195558.<pc>は 心を決めて\n宝箱を 開けた！:
<pc> made up his mind and opened the
treasure chest!

195559.なんと 宝箱の中には\n紙きれが たった１枚だけ 入っていた！:
To my surprise, there was only one piece of
paper in the treasure chest!

195560.<pc>は 紙きれを 手に取って読んだ。:
<pc> picked up a piece of paper and
read it.

195561.<center>その場所から 少し左を向き\n眼下に めいっぱい広がる 水平線を:
From that spot, turn slightly to the left and
look at the horizon stretching out below you!

195563.「とびっきりの お宝と聞けば\n 誰しも 金銀財宝を 思いうかべるだろうよ。:
When you hear the words "extraordinary
treasure," everyone probably thinks of gold,
silver, and treasures.

195564.「だがな！ 本当のお宝ってのは\n そんなもんじゃねぇ。:
But, you know! Real treasure is nothing like
that.

195565.「したたる汗…… とろけそうな脳ミソ……\n ビーチを必死にかけまわって たどり:
Sweat dripping down my face, my brain melting, I desperately scrambled around the beach and arrived at the destination, where I found a
view I'd never seen before.

195566.「おもいっきり遊んで この夏の風とにおいを\n 身体と記憶に焼きつけて……\n:
Play hard and burn the wind and smells of this
summer into your body and memory.

195567.「はははっ。じつはな 宝の地図だと 偽って\n <pc>を ここに 誘導しようと:
Ha-ha-ha. To tell the truth, it was all me who
planted the false treasure map to lead
<pc> here.

195568.「<pc>に 一生 忘れられない\n ひと夏の プレシャスメモリーを\n プレゼ:
I thought I would give <pc> a
precious memory of a summer he will never
forget!

195569.「オレは この時間 この場所から見える\n キュララナビーチの夕焼けが 大好きな:
I love the Kyurarana Beach sunset from this
location at this time of day!

195570.「アイツと見た 思い出の場所でもある……。\n だから <pc>にも\n 最高な:
It's also a place of memories that I saw with
him. So I wanted to show <pc> the
best performance.

195571.「オレにとっちゃあ この景色と\n ビーチに あふれる人々の キラキラした笑顔が:
For me, this view and the sparkling smiles of
the people on the beach are the most precious
treasures of all!

195572.「ほらよっ！ これは オレのお遊びに\n 付きあってくれた礼だ。\n エンリョな:
Here you go! This is for playing with me. Take
it without Enrio!

195573.「夏は まだまだ 続く……。\n <pc>も とびっきり 熱い夏を楽しんで\n:
Summer is still going on. I hope <pc>
also enjoy the hot summer and make
unforgettable summer memories!
